content.text:
I'll explore the codebase to understand its structure and purpose. C:\Users\1\3\awesome-ai-tools\README.md # Awesome AI Tools [![Awesome](https://awesome.re/badge.svg)](https://awesome.re) > A curated list of awesome AI tools Welcome to "Awesome AI Tools"! This repository is a curated list of innovative and useful Artificial Intelligence tools. Whether you're a developer, researcher, or enthusiast, you'll find a range of AI-powered tools here that can assist in various tasks, from machine learning frameworks to natural language processing utilities.

Follow the AI Lib page for the latest AI news and tool reviews!

## Sponsors ### [AI Lib](https://www.ailib.io/)

[AI Lib](https://www.ailib.io/) is an AI tools directory. Search through over 10,000 AI tools and more added daily. You can use your own knowledge by uploading your own documents and filter by pricing model, category and application. ## Contents - [What's new in AI?](#whats-new-in-ai) - [Chat with AI bots](#chat-with-ai-bots) - [Search engines](#search-engines) - [Local search engines](#local-search-engines) - [Writing assistants](#writing-assistants) - [ChatGPT extensions](#chatgpt-extensions) - [Productivity](#productivity) - [Developer tools](#developer-tools) - [Code assistants](#code-assistants) - [Meeting assistants](#meeting-assistants) - [Academia](#academia) - [Customer Support](#customer-support) - [Sales](#sales) - [Data analysis](#data-analysis) - [Content creation](#content-creation) - [Image](#image) - [Video](#video) - [Audio](#audio) - [Voice cloning](#voice-cloning) - [Music](#music) - [Other audio generators](#other-audio-generators) - [Phone calls](#phone-calls) - [Speech To Text](#speech-to-text) - [Marketing](#marketing) - [Legal](#legal) - [Finance](#finance) - [Design](#design) - [Fashion](#fashion) - [Gaming](#gaming) - [Agents & Automation](#agents--automation) - [Research](#research) - [Models and training](#models-and-training) - [Other lists](#other-lists) - [Autonomous AI Agents](#autonomous-ai-agents) - [Multi agents](#multi-agents) - [Learning resources](#learning-resources) ## What's new in AI? - [AI Lib](https://www.ailib.io/) - Search through the latest AI tools and news added daily. *#freemium* - [AI News](https://buttondown.email/ainews) - Daily email newsletter for AI news by an AI. Covers everything going on in AI within a day. *#free* - [Hacker News AI Filter](https://hn-ai.vercel.app) - Hacker News filtered for AI-related posts, auto updated hourly. *#free* ## Chat with AI bots ### Latest major releases - [ChatGPT](https://chat.openai.com) - Launched in November 2022, ChatGPT was a viral AI chatbot developed by OpenAI. It's the fastest-growing app in history. ChatGPT-4 is their latest multimodal model, and best known as the engine behind ChatGPT. - [Claude](https://claude.ai/) - Anthropic's AI Assistant. Claude's best model is Claude 3.5 Sonnet. Claude can assist with use cases including summarization, search, creative and collaborative writing, Q&A, coding, and more. - [Gemini](https://gemini.google.com) - Google's next-gen multimodal AI model, designed to replace Bard, with enhanced reasoning and integration. - [Grok](https://x.ai) - Built by xAI, Grok is a witty AI assistant inspired by Hitchhiker's Guide, offering real-time knowledge via the X platform. - [Mistral](https://chat.mistral.ai/) - Mistral AI's chat assistant utilizing its latest AI models. - [Le Chat](https://chat.mistral.ai/) - Mistral AI's chat assistant utilizing its latest AI models. - [Llama](https://www.meta.ai/) - Meta's Meta AI assistant powered by Llama 3, available across WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, and a web interface. - [Cohere](https://dashboard.cohere.ai/playground/chat) - Chat interface for Cohere, enterprise-focused AI platform specializing in NLP. - [HuggingChat](https://huggingface.co/chat) - Open-source chat interface by Hugging Face, supporting multiple AI models. - [Poe](https://poe.com/) - Chat platform offering access to multiple AI models (GPT-4, Claude, etc.) in one place. - [Copilot](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot) - Microsoft's AI-powered assistant integrating GPT-4 across Windows, Edge, and Microsoft 365 apps. - [DeepSeek](https://chat.deepseek.com/) - Chatbot powered by DeepSeek's AI models. The company has open sourced their reasoning model [DeepSeek-R1](https://huggingface.co/deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-R1) amongst other models. ### Historical | AI | First launch | | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- | | [ChatGPT](https://chat.openai.com/) by OpenAI | November 2022 | | [Bing Chat](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/edge/features/bing-chat?form=MT00D8) by Microsoft | February 2023 | | [Bard](https://bard.google.com/) by Google | March 2023 | | [Claude](https://claude.ai/) by Anthropic | March 2023 | | [Grok](https://x.ai/) by xAI | November 2023 | | [Gemini](https://gemini.google.com) by Google | February 2024 | | [Llama](https://www.meta.ai/) by Meta | April 2024 | | [Le Chat](https://chat.mistral.ai/) by Mistral AI | February 2024 | | [Copilot](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot) by Microsoft | December 2023 | | [DeepSeek](https://chat.deepseek.com/) by DeepSeek | January 2025 | ## Search engines - [Phind](https://www.phind.com/) - AI-based search engine. - [You.com](https://you.com/) - A search engine built on AI that provides users with a customized search experience while keeping their data 100% private. - [Perplexity AI](https://www.perplexity.ai/) - AI-powered search tools. - [Andi](https://andisearch.com/) - A search engine designed to search for the next generation using generative AI. - [Metaphor](https://metaphor.systems/) - Language model powered search. - [Lexii.ai](https://lexii.ai/) - An AI-powered search assistant. - [OpenAI SearchGPT](https://openai.com/index/searchgpt-prototype/) - A new AI-powered search engine by OpenAI. - [Exa](https://exa.ai/) - Knowledge API for AI. Search through 10B+ webpages using embeddings and LLM reranking. *#freemium* - [Genspark](https://www.genspark.ai/) - Creates custom AI-generated pages called Sparkpages, and eliminates spam and SEO content. *#free* - [FastGPT](https://labs.kagi.com/fastgpt) - Kagi's AI-powered search engine for fast, accurate answers with source citations. *#paid* ## Local search engines - [privateGPT](https://github.com/imartinez/privateGPT) - Ask questions to your documents without an internet connection, using the power of LLMs. - [quivr](https://github.com/StanGirard/quivr) - Dump all your files and chat with it using your generative AI second brain using LLMs & embeddings. - [Khoj](https://github.com/khoj-ai/khoj) - An AI copilot for your second brain. Search and chat with your personal knowledge base. - [txtai](https://github.com/neuml/txtai) - Semantic search platform that uses LLM to transform data and build AI-powered text workflows. ## Writing assistants - [Jasper](https://www.jasper.ai/) - Create content faster with artificial intelligence. - [Compose AI](https://www.compose.ai/) - Compose AI is a free Chrome extension that cuts your writing time by 40% with AI-powered autocompletion. - [Rytr](https://rytr.me/) - Rytr is an AI writing assistant that helps you create high-quality content. - [wordtune](https://www.wordtune.com/) - Personal writing assistant. - [HyperWrite](https://hyperwriteai.com/) - HyperWrite helps you write with confidence and get your work done faster from idea to final draft. - [Moonbeam](https://www.gomoonbeam.com/) - Better blogs in a fraction of the time. - [copy.ai](https://www.copy.ai/) - Write better marketing copy and content with AI. - [Anyword](https://anyword.com/) - Anyword's AI writing assistant generates effective copy for anyone. - [Contenda](https://contenda.co/) - Create the content your audience wants, from content you've already made. - [Hypotenuse AI](https://www.hypotenuse.ai/) - Turn a few keywords into original, insightful articles, product descriptions and social media copy. - [Lavender](https://www.lavender.ai/) - Lavender email assistant helps you get more replies in less time. - [Lex](https://lex.page/) - A word processor with artificial intelligence baked in, so you can write faster. - [Jenni](https://jenni.ai/) - Jenni is the ultimate writing assistant that saves you hours of ideation and writing time. - [LAIKA](https://www.writewithlaika.com/) - LAIKA trains an artificial intelligence on your own writing to create a personalised creative partner-in-crime. - [QuillBot](https://quillbot.com) - AI-powered paraphrasing tool. - [Postwise](https://postwise.ai/) - Write tweets, schedule posts and grow your following using AI. - [Copysmith](https://copysmith.ai/) - AI content creation solution for Enterprise & eCommerce. - [Yomu](https://www.yomu.ai) - AI writing assistant for students and academics. - [Listomatic](https://listomatic.app) - Free AI real estate listing description generator. - [Quick Creator](https://quickcreator.io) - SEO-Optimized Blog platform powered by AI. - [Telborg](https://telborg.com/) - Write a high-quality first draft on any Climate topic in minutes - [Dittto.ai](https://dittto.ai) - Fix your hero copy with an AI trained on top SaaS websites. - [Penlope](https://penelopeai.com) - AI-powered markdown editor with autocomplete, cogen, and semantic search. - [Superflows](https://www.superflows.ai) - Build an AI assistant that answers user questions about your product from documentation, in-app within hours. - [Frase](https://frase.io/) - Frase helps you research, write, and optimize high-quality SEO content in minutes instead of hours. *#freemium* ## ChatGPT extensions - [WebChatGPT](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/webchatgpt-chatgpt-with-i/lpfemeioodjbpieminkklglpmhlngfcn) - Augment your ChatGPT prompts with relevant results from the web. - [GPT for Sheets and Docs](https://workspace.google.com/marketplace/app/gpt_for_sheets_and_docs/677318054654) - ChatGPT extension for Google Sheets and Google Docs. - [YouTube Summary with ChatGPT](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/youtube-summary-with-chat/nmmicjeknamkfloonkhhcjmomieiodli) - Use ChatGPT to summarize YouTube videos. - [ChatGPT Prompt Genius](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/chatgpt-prompt-genius/jjdnakkfjnnbbckhifcfchagnpofjffo) - Discover, share, import, and use the best prompts for ChatGPT & save your chat history locally. - [ChatGPT for Search Engines](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/chatgpt-for-search-engine/feeonheemodpkdckaljcjogdncpiiban) - Display ChatGPT response alongside Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo search results. - [ShareGPT](https://sharegpt.com/) - Share your ChatGPT conversations and explore conversations shared by others. - [Merlin](https://merlin.foyer.work/) - ChatGPT Plus extension on all websites. - [ChatGPT Writer](https://chatgptwriter.ai/) - Generate emails and replies using ChatGPT AI. - [ChatGPT for Jupyter](https://github.com/TiesdeKok/chat-gpt-jupyter-extension) - Add various helper functions in Jupyter Notebooks and Jupyter Lab, powered by ChatGPT. - [editGPT](https://www.editgpt.app/) - Easily proofread, edit, and track changes to your content in chatGPT. - [Chatbot UI](https://www.chatbotui.com/) - An open source ChatGPT UI. [Source code](https://github.com/mckaywrigley/chatbot-ui). - [Forefront](https://www.forefront.ai/) - A Better ChatGPT Experience. ## Productivity - [Mem](https://mem.ai/) - Mem is the world's first AI-powered workspace that's personalized to you. Amplify your creativity, automate the mundane, and stay organized automatically. - [Taskade](https://www.taskade.com/) - Outline tasks, notes, generated structured lists and mind maps with Taskade AI. - [Notion AI](https://www.notion.so/product/ai) - Write better, more efficient notes and docs. - [Nekton AI](https://nekton.ai) - Automate your workflows with AI. Describe your workflows step by step in plain language. - [Elephas](https://elephas.app/?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - Personal AI writing assistant for the Mac. - [Lemmy](https://lemmy.co/?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - Autonomous AI Assistant for Work. - [Google Sheets Formula Generator](https://bettersheets.co/google-sheets-formula-generator?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - Forget about frustrating formulas in Google Sheets. - [CreateEasily](https://createeasily.com/?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - Free speech-to-text tool for content creators that accurately transcribes audio & video files up to 2GB. - [Cogram](https://www.cogram.com/?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - Cogram takes automatic notes in virtual meetings and identifies action items. - [Sybill](https://www.sybill.ai/?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - Sybill generates summaries of sales calls, including next steps, pain points and areas of interest, by combining transcript and emotion-based insights. - [Summari](https://www.summari.com/?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - Transform long links into summarized previews in seconds. - [Bardeen](https://www.bardeen.ai/?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - Automate repetitive activities with a simple shortcut, then sit back as Bardeen runs 24/7 on autopilot. - [JobHire.AI](https://www.jobhire.ai/?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - Create professional, tailored resumes and cover letters in seconds. *#freemium* - [ChatPlayground AI](https://chatplayground.ai/?via=mahseema) - All-in-one Chat AI SaaS that provides best-in-class chat experience by leveraging the best AI models and LLMs like GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini Pro, and more. *#freemium* - [ShortLoop](https://shortloop.ai/) - An AI tool that delivers instant answers from your team's documents and apps. *#free* ## Developer tools - [co:here](https://cohere.ai/) - Cohere provides access to advanced Large Language Models and NLP tools. - [Haystack](https://haystack.deepset.ai/) - A framework for building NLP applications (e.g. agents, semantic search, question-answering) with language models. - [LangChain](https://langchain.com/) - A framework for developing applications powered by language models. - [gpt4all](https://github.com/nomic-ai/gpt4all) - A chatbot trained on a massive collection of clean assistant data including code, stories, and dialogue. - [LLM App](https://github.com/pathwaycom/llm-app) - Open-source Python application for question answering over documents with live data synchronization. - [LMQL](https://lmql.ai/) - LMQL is a query language for large language models. - [LlamaIndex](https://www.llamaindex.ai/) - A data framework for building LLM applications over external data. - [Anthropic Claude](https://www.anthropic.com/api) - Claude is a family of foundational AI models that can be used in a variety of applications from API to Claude.ai web interface. - [Cursor](https://www.cursor.com/) - An AI-first code editor designed for pair programming, featuring code generation, editing, and discussion capabilities. - [Phoenix](https://phoenix.arize.com/) - Open-source tool for ML observability that runs in your notebook environment, by Arize. Monitor and fine-tune LLM, CV, and tabular models. - [Glean](https://www.glean.com/) - Enterprise AI assistant that connects to your company's data and enables knowledge sharing. - [Warp](https://www.warp.dev/) - Warp is a modern, Rust-based terminal with AI built in so you and your team can build great software, faster. - [Sourcery](https://sourcery.ai/) - Automatic code refactoring using AI. - [Cody](https://sourcegraph.com/cody) - Sourcegraph Cody is a free AI code assistant that can write and edit code while also answering questions about your code. - [CodiumAI](https://www.codium.ai/) - AI assistant for writing tests, focusing on code integrity. - [Plandex](https://plandex.ai/) - Open source, terminal-based AI programming engine for complex tasks. Uses multiple agents and sandboxed file handling. - [Aider](https://aider.chat/) - Aider is AI pair programming in your terminal. - [ZZZ Code AI](https://zzzcode.ai) - AI-powered free website to get any programming question answered or code generated. - [AskCodi](https://www.askcodi.com) - AskCodi is made keeping in mind the needs of developers to avoid redundant tasks and increase productivity. - [Devv](https://devv.ai) - An AI-powered search engine for developers. - [GPTStack](https://gptstack.ai) - Create scalable AI assistants using multiple LLMs and tools. - [Adrenaline](https://useadrenaline.com/) - Debugging assistant based on the OpenAI Codex. It can fix and explain your code in seconds. - [Open Interpreter](https://openinterpreter.com/) - Run code (Python, Javascript, Shell, and more) locally using natural language. - [Mutable.ai](https://mutable.ai/) - AI-accelerated software development. - [Claude Dev](https://github.com/saoudrizwan/claude-dev) - An AI-powered coding assistant that integrates with VS Code, supporting multi-file projects. - [v0](https://v0.dev/) - AI-powered frontend development tool by Vercel, capable of generating UI components based on prompts. - [bolt.new](https://bolt.new/) - AI-powered full-stack development tool in browser. Can scaffold, edit, run, and deploy applications. - [Lovable](https://lovable.dev/) - A copilot-driven development environment for building web applications with AI-assistance. *#freemium* - [Windsurf](https://codeium.com/windsurf) - An agentic IDE by Codeium for AI-assisted coding. *#freemium* - [Replit Agent](https://replit.com/~) - An AI agent that can build web apps from prompts. *#freemium* - [Claude Code](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/claude-code) - An agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal. *#paid* ## Code assistants - [GitHub Copilot](https://github.com/features/copilot) - GitHub Copilot uses the OpenAI Codex to suggest code and entire functions in real-time, right from your editor. - [OpenAI Codex](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/code/) - An AI system by OpenAI that translates natural language to code. - [Ghostwriter](https://blog.replit.com/ai) - An AI-powered pair programmer by replit. - [Amazon Q Developer](https://aws.amazon.com/q/developer/) - (Previously Amazon CodeWhisperer) An AI code assistant by Amazon. - [Tabnine](https://www.tabnine.com/) - Code faster with whole-line & full-function code completions. - [Stenography](https://stenography.dev/) - Automatic code documentation. - [Mintlify](https://mintlify.com/) - AI-powered documentation writer. - [Debuild](https://debuild.app/) - AI-powered low-code tool for web apps. - [AI2sql](https://www.ai2sql.io/) - Engineers and non-engineers can easily write efficient, error-free SQL queries without knowing SQL. - [CodiumAI](https://www.codium.ai/) - With CodiumAI, you get non-trivial tests suggested right inside your IDE, so you stay confident when you push. - [PR-Agent](https://github.com/Codium-ai/pr-agent) - AI-powered tool for automated PR analysis, feedback, suggestions, and more. - [MutableAI](https://mutable.ai/) - AI Accelerated Software Development. - [TurboPilot](https://github.com/ravenscroftj/turbopilot) - A self-hosted copilot clone that uses the library behind llama.cpp to run the 6 billion parameter Salesforce Codegen model in 4 GB of RAM. - [GPT-Code UI](https://github.com/ricklamers/gpt-code-ui) - An open-source implementation of OpenAI's ChatGPT Code interpreter. - [MetaGPT](https://github.com/geekan/MetaGPT) - A multi-agent framework that, given one-line requirement, returns PRD, design, tasks, or repo. - [Marblism](https://marblism.com) - Generate a SaaS boilerplate from a prompt. - [MarsCode](https://www.marscode.com/) - AI-powered cloud IDE and code assistant. *#free* - [Trae](https://www.trae.ai/) - Adaptive AI IDE by ByteDance featuring AI-driven code generation, completion, and debugging. *#free* ## Meeting assistants - [Otter.ai](https://otter.ai/) - A meeting assistant that records audio, writes notes, automatically captures slides, and generates summaries. - [Cogram](https://www.cogram.com/) - Cogram takes automatic notes in virtual meetings and identifies action items. - [Sybill](https://www.sybill.ai/) - Sybill generates summaries of sales calls, including next steps, pain points and areas of interest, by combining transcript and emotion-based insights. - [Loopin AI](https://www.loopinhq.com/) - Loopin is a collaborative meeting workspace that not only enables you to record, transcribe & summarize meetings using AI, but also enables you to auto-organise meeting notes on top of your calendar. - [Fireflies.ai](https://fireflies.ai/) - AI assistant that records, transcribes, and searches meetings and voice conversations. - [Equal Time](https://www.equaltime.io/) - Inclusive meeting assistant with AI-powered real-time transcription, auto-generated meeting notes, and speaker analytics for equitable participation. - [MeetGeek](https://meetgeek.ai/?via=mahseema) - MeetGeek is your AI meeting assistant that automatically records, transcribes, summarizes, and provides key insights of every meeting. *#freemium* ## Academia - [Elicit](https://elicit.com/) - Elicit uses language models to help you automate research workflows, like parts of literature review. - [genei](https://www.genei.io/) - Summarise academic articles in seconds and save 80% on your research times. - [Scite](https://scite.ai/) - Scite.ai is a platform designed for the discovery and evaluation of scientific articles, offering Smart Citations that reveal the context of citations, AI-powered search functionality. - [Paperpal](https://paperpal.com/) - Paperpal is an AI writing assistant that helps academics write better, faster with real-time suggestions for language and grammar and in-depth writing suggestions for language and grammar corrections and suggestions. - [Jenni](https://jenni.ai/) - Jenni is the ultimate writing assistant that saves you hours of ideation and writing time. - [Explainpaper](https://www.explainpaper.com/) - A better way to read academic papers. Upload a paper, highlight confusing text, get an explanation. - [Galactica](https://galactica.org/) - A large language model for science. Can summarize academic literature, solve math problems, generate Wiki articles, write scientific code, annotate molecules and proteins, and more. [Model API](https://github.com/paperswithcode/galai). - [Consensus](https://consensus.app/search/) - Consensus is a search engine that uses AI to find answers in scientific research. - [SciSpace](https://typeset.io/) - Your AI copilot to decode any research paper. The quickest way to read and understand scientific literature. - [Scholarcy](https://www.scholarcy.com/) - AI-powered tool to read, understand, and organize research papers. - [Sourcely](https://www.sourcely.net/) - Academic citation finding tool with AI. ## Customer Support - [Zendesk AI](https://www.zendesk.com/service/ai/) - Zendesk AI agents automate customer service interactions, resolving tickets independently while providing a personalized support experience. *#paid* - [SiteGPT](https://sitegpt.ai/?via=mahseema) - Make AI your expert customer support agent. *#freemium* - [GPTHelp.ai](https://gpthelp.ai/?ref=mahseema-awesome-ai-tools) - ChatGPT for your website / AI customer support chatbot. *#freemium* - [SiteSpeakAI](https://sitespeak.ai) - Automate your customer support with AI. *#freemium* - [Stammer.ai](https://stammer.ai/?fpr=mahseema) - Build AI Agents for Customer Support in Minutes. *#freemium* - [VoiceSpin](https://voicespin.com/) - AI-powered contact center platform with AI voice bots and AI messaging, speech analytics, and more. *#paid* - [Talkstack AI](https://www.talkstack.ai/) - Multilingual AI agents for customer service and sales over calls and texts. *#freemium* ## Sales - [Copy.ai](https://www.copy.ai/) - AI tool for generating sales copy and marketing content. - [Lavender](https://www.lavender.ai/) - AI email assistant for sales professionals. - [Instantly](https://instantly.ai/) - Cold email platform with AI tools for email writing and lead management. - [Vapi.ai](https://vapi.ai/?via=mahseema) - Build voice AI agents for sales and customer support. *#freemium* ## Data analysis - [Research Studio](https://researchstudio.ai/?ref=mahseema) - AI tool for user research analysis and insight generation. ## Content creation - [Eleven Labs](https://elevenlabs.io/) - AI-powered text-to-speech and voice cloning platform. - [Make-A-Video](https://makeavideo.studio/) - Meta's AI system that generates videos from text. - [Pictory](https://pictory.ai/) - AI video generator with templates. - [HeyGen](https://heygen.com/) - AI avatar video generator. - [Runway](https://runwayml.com/) - Professional-grade AI video tools. - [Notion AI](https://www.notion.so/product/ai) - AI assistant for writing and organization. - [Beautiful.ai](https://www.beautiful.ai/) - AI presentation maker. - [Gamma](https://gamma.app/) - AI presentation and document creation tool. - [Tome](https://tome.app/) - AI-powered storytelling format. ## Image ### Models - [DALLÂ·E 3](https://openai.com/index/dall-e-3/) - OpenAI's latest image generation model. - [Midjourney](https://www.midjourney.com/) - Popular AI image generation tool accessed through Discord. - [Stable Diffusion](https://stability.ai/stable-image) - Open-source image generation model. - [Flux](https://blackforestlabs.ai/announcing-black-forest-labs/) - Black Forest Labs' latest text-to-image model. - [Ideogram](https://ideogram.ai/) - AI image generation tool with strong text-rendering capabilities. - [Imagen](https://imagen.research.google/) - Google's text-to-image diffusion model. - [Recraft](https://www.recraft.ai/) - AI image generation with design focus. *#freemium* - [Firefly](https://www.adobe.com/products/firefly.html) - Adobe's generative AI tool for image creation. - [Leonardo AI](https://leonardo.ai/) - AI image generation for creative production. - [Grok Aurora](https://x.ai/blog/grok-3) - xAI's latest image generation model. - [Gemini Imagen 3](https://deepmind.google/technologies/gemini/image-generation/) - Google's latest and best text-to-image model. ### Services - [Luma AI](https://lumalabs.ai/) - Capture 3D experiences with Luma AI. - [Craiyon](https://www.craiyon.com/) - Craiyon, formerly DALL-E mini, is an AI model that can draw images from any text prompt. - [DreamStudio](https://dreamstudio.ai/) - An easy-to-use interface for Stable Diffusion. - [Artbreeder](https://www.artbreeder.com/) - Tool for creating images by blending existing ones. - [GauGAN2](http://gaugan.org/gaugan2/) - NVIDIA's image generation tool. - [Magic Eraser](https://www.magiceraser.io/) - Remove unwanted things from images in seconds. - [Imagine by Magic Studio](https://magicstudio.com/imagine) - Create images from text. - [Alpaca](https://www.getalpaca.io/) - Stable Diffusion Photoshop plugin. - [PhotoRoom](https://www.photoroom.com/) - Create product and portrait pictures using only your phone. - [Mage](https://www.mage.space/) - Free, fast, unfiltered Stable Diffusion interface. - [MemeCam](https://www.memecam.io/) - Generate meme-style images from photos. - [Getimg.ai](https://getimg.ai/) - Suite of magical AI tools for image creation. - [Pebblely](https://pebblely.com/) - Create beautiful product photos. - [StockAI](https://www.stockai.com/) - AI-powered stock photos. - [IllostrationAI](https://www.illustrationai.com/) - Create AI-generated illustrations. - [BeFunky](https://www.befunky.com/) - Photo editing tools with AI features. - [Facet 2.0](https://facet.ai/) - AI-powered image editing. - [Erase.bg](https://www.erase.bg/) - Remove image backgrounds automatically. - [Cleanup.pictures](https://cleanup.pictures/) - Remove unwanted objects from photos. - [Profile Picture AI](https://www.profilepicture.ai/) - Create professional AI profile pictures. - [PicWish](https://picwish.com/) - AI-powered image processing tools. - [Img Upscaler](https://imgupscaler.com/) - AI image upscaling. - [AI Image Upscaler](https://www.upscale.media/) - Here is a summary: ## Repository Overview: awesome-ai-tools This is an **Awesome List** repository - a curated collection of AI tools organized by category. It follows the [Awesome List](https://awesome.re) format, which is a popular GitHub convention for community-curated resource lists. ### Structure ``` awesome-ai-tools/ âââ README.md # Main content file with all AI tools âââ CONTRIBUTING.md # Contribution guidelines (links to awesome list standards) âââ LICENSE.md # License file âââ images/ â âââ ailib.png # Sponsor logo âââ .github/ âââ FUNDING.yml # GitHub sponsorship configuration ``` ### Content Organization The README.md contains a comprehensive list of AI tools organized into **30+ categories**: 1. **Chat & Search**: AI chatbots (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, etc.), search engines (Perplexity, Phind) 2. **Productivity**: Writing assistants, meeting tools, productivity apps 3. **Development**: Code assistants (GitHub Copilot, Cursor), developer tools, IDEs 4. **Content Creation**: Image (DALL-E, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion), Video (Sora, Runway), Audio (ElevenLabs, Suno) 5. **Business**: Marketing, sales, customer support, legal, finance 6. **Design & Creative**: Graphic design, fashion, gaming 7. **Research & Learning**: Academia, research tools, learning resources 8. **AI Infrastructure**: Models, training platforms, autonomous agents, multi-agent frameworks ### Key Characteristics - **Well-maintained**: Recent commits show active maintenance - **Community-driven**: Accepts pull requests for new tools - **Monetized**: Has sponsor (AI Lib) and funding options - **Comprehensive**: Covers virtually all AI application domains - **Format**: Each entry has tool name, link, and brief description with optional pricing tags (#free, #freemium, #paid) ### Critical Files for Implementation - `C:\Users\1\3\awesome-ai-tools\README.md` - Main content file containing all tool listings - `C:\Users\1\3\awesome-ai-tools\CONTRIBUTING.md` - Contribution guidelines - `C:\Users\1\3\awesome-ai-tools\.github\FUNDING.yml` - Sponsorship configuration
